Desc.eng: Get closer, get your face smashed in.
Seems like this gentleman is in a cheerful mood. Who are you and how did you end up here?
I'm a Daywalker, just like you friend over there, with one small difference: I slay vampires. I'm also an expert swordsman, who...
Oh, this is the bloodsucker who was sent to prison by the city council for petty scams and not paying taxes.
Ghosts, vampires...vermin is vermin. Say what you want, but I promise you, you will be dead by dawn.
